typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		fname as string,
		lname as string,
		address as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(Fullname = fname+" "+lname) ~> FullName
FullName sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['comma_file.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> outputfile
